ViewPoint.description: This viewpoint is intented to deal with the organizational structure

EditionPattern.name: OrganizationalUnit
EditionPattern.description: Allows to define an organization unit inside an other organization unit.

DropScheme.name: DropOrganizationalUnitInOrganizationalUnit
DropScheme.label: DropOrganizationalUnitInOrganizationalUnit
DropScheme.description: Create a new organization unit inside parent organization unit

TextFieldParameter.name: organizationUnitName
TextFieldParameter.label: organization_unit_name
TextFieldParameter.description: Allow to enter organization unit name while dropping concept

URIParameter.name: organizationUnitURI
URIParameter.label: uri
URIParameter.description: Allow to enter (unique) individual name used in Ontology

TextAreaParameter.name: organizationUnitDescription
TextAreaParameter.label: organization_unit_description
TextAreaParameter.description: Allow to enter a short description of the organization unit

TextAreaParameter.name: missionDescription
TextAreaParameter.label: missionDescription
TextAreaParameter.defaultValue: "Please describe here the mission of organizational unit"

DropScheme.name: DropOrganizationalUnitInTopLevel
DropScheme.label: DropOrganizationalUnitInTopOrganizationalUnit
DropScheme.description: Create a new organization unit at top level

TextAreaParameter.name: missionDescription
TextAreaParameter.label: missionDescription
TextAreaParameter.defaultValue: "Please describe here the mission of organizational unit"

DropScheme.name: DrawOrganizationalUnitInOrganizationalUnit
DropScheme.label: DrawOrganizationalUnitInOrganizationalUnit
DropScheme.description: Draw an existing Organization Unit. These can be done only at top level.

EditionPattern.name: OrganizationalUnitObjective
EditionPattern.description: Allows to define an objective for an organization unit

TextFieldParameter.name: objectiveName
TextFieldParameter.label: objective
TextFieldParameter.description: Allow to enter short name for objective

URIParameter.name: objectiveURI
URIParameter.label: uri
URIParameter.description: Allow to enter (unique) individual name used in Ontology

TextAreaParameter.name: objectiveDescription
TextAreaParameter.label: objective_description
TextAreaParameter.description: Allow to enter a short description for the organization unit objective

EditionPattern.name: OrganizationalUnitPosition
EditionPattern.description: Allows to add a position for an organization unit

DropScheme.name: DropPositionInOrganizationalUnit
DropScheme.label: DropPositionInOrganizationalUnit
DropScheme.description: Create a position in organizational unit

TextFieldParameter.name: positionName
TextFieldParameter.label: position
TextFieldParameter.description: Allow to enter short name for position

URIParameter.name: positionURI
URIParameter.label: uri
URIParameter.description: Allow to enter (unique) individual name used in Ontology

TextAreaParameter.name: positionDescription
TextAreaParameter.label: position_description
TextAreaParameter.description: Allow to enter a short description for the organization unit position

DropScheme.name: DrawPositionInOrganizationalUnit
DropScheme.label: DrawPositionInOrganizationalUnit
DropScheme.description: Choose an existing position of organizational unit and represent it

EditionPattern.name: PositionTask
EditionPattern.description: Allows to define a position task

TextFieldParameter.name: taskName
TextFieldParameter.label: task
TextFieldParameter.description: Allow to enter short name for task

URIParameter.name: taskURI
URIParameter.label: uri
URIParameter.description: Allow to enter (unique) individual name used in Ontology

TextAreaParameter.name: taskDescription
TextAreaParameter.label: task_description
TextAreaParameter.description: Allow to enter a short description for the position task

LocalizedDictionary.Localized: Choose and draw root organization unit
